Detail:
Detail:

This setting is the multiplier for the painting resolution.
1x is 16x16, 2x is 32x32, 4x is 64x64.


Troubleshooting:

Some hardware may not support texture atlases that are larger than 8x (128x128).
Pack Format:
Pack Format:

This is how Minecraft knows what version of the game your painting pack is for. You can see the format numbers for each version here.


Troubleshooting:

If it is telling you that your resource pack is incompatible, it probably isn't actually and should still load in-game.

Paintings don't change very often, so normally changing the format version is enough to make the warning go away. If paintings have changed, update the program and convert and import your draft to update the pack.
